00059 Ecode_t ezradioHandleCrcErrorPlugin( EZRADIODRV_Handle_t radioHandle, EZRADIODRV_ReplyHandle_t radioReplyHandle )
00060 {
00061   if ( radioHandle == NULL )
00062   {
00063     return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00064   }
00065 
00066   /* Check if CRC IT is received */
00067   if ( radioReplyHandle->GET_INT_STATUS.PH_PEND & EZRADIO_CMD_GET_INT_STATUS_REP_PH_PEND_CRC_ERROR_PEND_BIT)
00068   {
00069     /* Reset FIFO */
00070     ezradio_change_state(EZRADIO_CMD_CHANGE_STATE_ARG_NEXT_STATE1_NEW_STATE_ENUM_READY);
00071     ezradio_fifo_info(EZRADIO_CMD_FIFO_INFO_ARG_FIFO_RX_BIT, NULL);
00072 
00073     if ( radioHandle->packetCrcError.userCallback != NULL )
00074     {
00075       radioHandle->packetCrcError.userCallback( radioHandle, ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_OK );
00076     }
00077   }
00078 
00079   return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_OK;
00080 }
00081 
00083 
00084 #endif //#if ( defined EZRADIO_PLUGIN_CRC_ERROR )
